Content.Text:
<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there! Aren't you the new farmer in town?
I'm Maurice.
<PAGE>
I'm the proprietor of the town's inn. Nice to meet
you!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How are you?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How's it going?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You sure seem like
you're rearin' to go! Good job fighting the urge to
sleep in.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How's the farm going?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? How are you?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You sure seem like you've got
a lot on your plate. Don't work yourself sick,
okay?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. How's work going? You finished
for the day?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, how's it going? Burning the midnight oil,
huh?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Are you still working?! You're
a machine!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It sure is a lovely day, isn't it? Perfect day for a
walk.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Such a gloomy day. This humidity always makes
me feel kind of depressed.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a nice day, I guess, but...it's too hot!
Everything I do on days like this just feels
exhausting.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Such gloom, such hume...idity...
...I think I'm delirious...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a beautiful day, isn't it? The kind of day that
just gets you pumped for whatever life has in
store!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know why, but autumn rain always looks
kind of...sad to me. I often find myself lost in
thought on days like this.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is one of those "sunny, but cold" days,
huh? You look out your window and think it's
going to feel warm out, but...nope!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Be careful out in the snow. It's really easy to slip
and hurt yourself.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you doing out in this weather?! I guess
since you've come all this way, you can stay a
while, but take better care of yourself!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you doing out on a snowy day like
this?! You should go home! You'll get stuck
here!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Hey, <MYNAME>...is it true you've been dating
someone? Heh. Not bad, not bad at all!
<PAGE>
You'd better invite me to the wedding, okay?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I come here from time to time so I can chat with
Gunther. It's nice!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seems a lot of tools are kept here. I come to
borrow a few every now and again.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's really tough, raising two daughters...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Shhh... I'm fishing right now. If you make too
much noise, you'll scare my dinner away!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rumor has it there's a huge fish in this river.
<PAGE>
I come fishing here from time to time, but I've
never seen anything big. Like, not BIG big,
anyway.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This land's well taken care of, I see...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That spoiled girl is growing rice here, huh?
...Guess you really can't always judge a book by
its cover.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sometimes, I get the urge to go somewhere far
away...but I'm not really one for mountain hikes,
so I usually call it off pretty quick.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My daughters told me I should walk for my
health, so I try to squeeze in as much as I can. I
enjoy it, though, I have to say!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's life treating you? If you ever have any
questions, feel free to ask.
<PAGE>
...Though since Veronica's taking care of you, I
probably don't have much to worry about, do I?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you like fishing, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
I often go fishing in the mountains, but if you
should ever find a good spot, do be sure to let
me know!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Taking care of a farm must be tough. Growing
crops and looking after animals... I don't think I
could do it.
<PAGE>
But I'll bet vegetables you grow yourself taste
extra delicious, huh? Maybe you could see it in
your heart to share some with me...?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lillie and Melanie have enough distance between
their ages, so they get along pretty well. Which
is good.
<PAGE>
They also help me out with the housework a lot,
maybe on account of their latent motherly
instincts or something.
<PAGE>
Whatever the reason, I really appreciate it!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My family has been running this inn here for
generations...but to be honest, it's not doing too
well.
<PAGE>
Doesn't really have to, though. As long as I can
make enough money to provide for my family,
that's all that matters to me.
<PAGE>
See, the reason my business isn't doing well is
because of my philosophy, I guess you could
say. I intentionally undercharge.
<PAGE>
I want people to stay longer and fall in love with
this town, and that seems like the best way to
do it.
<PAGE>
My favorite thing as an innkeeper is when
somebody says they want to visit again. And
that's all the payment I need, in the end.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was born and raised in this town, so I don't
know much about anywhere else.
<PAGE>
I've never even given a second thought to
staying here, either. This is the best place in the
world for me, as far as I'm concerned.
<PAGE>
Traveling is all well and good, but when you talk
to people who've traveled far and wide to get
here, it's just as exciting.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Ever since you got here, I feel
like the air has shifted, so to speak. But in a
good way!
<PAGE>
It feels like this town has gotten
more...boisterous, I guess? I mean, it wasn't bad
before or anything...
<PAGE>
...but I've always loved it, and always wanted to
see more people flock here.
<PAGE>
And now, it's actually happened. People come
here from all over the world. It's wonderful!
<PAGE>
And I think it's you farmers that did it. It's
because you guys work so hard every day.
<PAGE>
...Especially you, <MYNAME>. You took a big
part in this. I sincerely thank you from the
bottom of my heart for all you've done.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you brought me a lovely
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! This is my favorite
thing in the world.
<PAGE>
You're so kind! Thank you so much!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you really want to give me this? That's
great! Thank you so much!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
How did you know what I like?! Thanks so
much!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What is this? ...It's for me?! Wow,
thanks!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? ...Well, since it's a gift from you,
I can't very well say no to it!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm...not a big fan of these. I'm not sure if you
realized that.
<PAGE>
I'll accept it this time, though, since it's a gift.
But you might want to be a little choosier next
time around, if you don't mind me saying.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I can't eat sweet things. And this is pretty much
the worst for me...
<PAGE>
But it's the thought that counts, and I do
appreciate the thought, so...I'll take it. I'll give it
to my daughters. Thank you.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What's this? It's awfully glittery! I'll gladly
take it. Thanks!
Let's not give him a present right now.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, now, it's been quite a while! ...Hmm? Is
this for me? I'm sorry, but I can't accept this out
of the blue. Save it for another time.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Didn't you already give me something? I'd feel
bad accepting this many gifts from you. You
should save that for another time.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you brought me a lovely
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>! This is my favorite
thing in the world. You shouldn't have!
<PAGE>
Oh, it's for my birthday? I'm a little old for
birthday presents, but hey, I'll never say no to
generosity. Thanks!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you really want to give me this, huh?
That's great! Thank you so much! ...Hmm? It's a
present for my birthday?
<PAGE>
Today IS my birthday, isn't it? I'd totally
forgotten about that! Thanks!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
How did you know what I like?! Thanks so
much! What a thoughtful birthday gift!
<PAGE>
To be honest, I'd completely forgotten today was
my birthday until now.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm? A present for my birthday?! ...You're so
kind. Thank you very much.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Is this for me? ...Well, since it's a birthday gift
from you, I can't very well say no to it, now, can
I?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm...not a big fan of these. I'm not sure if you
realized that. ...Oh? It's a birthday present?!
<PAGE>
I'll accept it this time, then, but you might want
to be a little choosier next time around, if you
don't mind me saying.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I can't eat sweet things. And this is pretty much
the worst for me...
<PAGE>
But it's the thought that counts, and I do
appreciate you remembering my birthday, so...I'll
give it to my daughters. Thank you.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What's this? A birthday present...for
me?! And so glittery! How can I possibly say
no?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, you know I'm scared of animals,
right?! Put that thing away!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, you know I'm scared of animals,
right?! Put that thing away!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, you know I'm scared of animals,
right?! Put that thing away!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, you know I'm scared of animals,
right?! Put that thing away!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this...your pet?
...You are an odd one, aren't you?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, don't get that thing near me! It's creepy...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, you know I'm scared of animals,
right?! Put that thing away!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, you know I'm scared of animals,
right?! Put that thing away!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this...your pet? Come on, you know I'm
scared of animals, right?!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, you know I'm scared of animals,
right?! Put that thing away!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this...your pet? Come on, you know I'm
scared of animals, right?!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, I'm allergic to cats! Keep it away!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, I'm allergic to cats as badly as that cat isn't
allergic to second helpings!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, I'm allergic to cats! Keep it away!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, I'm allergic to cats as badly as that cat isn't
allergic to second helpings!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is that for the Flower Fair? Thanks, kiddo!
You're so considerate.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a genuine blue feather you've got, isn't it?
Which means you must have someone in mind
to give it to. Go to them! Go! Fly, you fool!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That ring...means you've got someone precious
in your life, huh? That's really great. Good luck,
and here's to a happy future!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a beautiful wrapping job. What's inside, I
wonder?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've got a present for me, huh? What's in
there, I wonder?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please take this. It's a present from me.
<PAGE>
Happy birthday, kiddo! You didn't forget, did
you? Because that would be super-sad!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's your birthday, isn't it? Well, happy
birthday!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. It's been a long time, huh?
<PAGE>
Can't even remember the last time you dropped
by. How's business? Good?
<PAGE>
I understand you've got a lot on your plate, but
an occasional visit wouldn't hurt, you know!
Just something to keep in mind.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, those are some nice work clothes. They look
really comfortable.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, those are some nice work clothes. They look
really comfortable. And cute, for that matter!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look pretty stylish in...are those work
clothes? Seems kind of a shame, when you
think about how dirty they're bound to get...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's very...red. Looks good on you, but
might be a little ostentatious for my tastes.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you wearing today? You look like you're
about to go to work at a restaurant, not a farm...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look strong today. Like a...kung fu master,
or...something like that...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a cute outfit. I love the red skirt on you.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not even really sure how to describe that
coat you're wearing. You certainly don't look like
a farmer in it!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know much about fashion, so forgive me
if I'm way off-base here, but...what in the world
is that?! You look...authoritative...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's certainly a cute outfit, but...can you
actually do farm work in that?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You've got a nice, simple look to you today. I
love the vest.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa! That's pretty flashy, but it looks good on
you.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You've got a nice, simple look to you today. I
love the blue vest.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That outfit... That pattern... I think I've seen it
before...
<PAGE>
Oh yeah, it's called a "kilt," isn't it? It's traditional
garb from another country, and is pretty well-
known for being a men's skirt.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, your outfit looks super-cute today. Maybe
a little childish, but it suits you! ...And I mean
that in a good way, I swear...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a nice jacket. Makes you look...mature,
and sophisticated.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think I've seen that outfit somewhere before. It's
a spy uniform, right? From another country, if
I'm not mistaken.
<PAGE>
Seems a little impractical for a spy outfit,
though, since it...kinda sticks out like a sore
thumb, you know?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That outfit looks very...mature. It looks good on
you, don't get me wrong, but...maybe you
shouldn't walk around in it too much?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha, what are you wearing?! If my daughters
saw that, they would flip out!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nice, er...armor. What...uh...are you doing in it,
though? You...off to war...or something?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's a nice hat. Where did you get it?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a cute hat. You look good in red.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a cute hat, but isn't it a little too small...?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's a really nice hat. Should be standard
uniform for farmers, if you ask me! Don't you
think?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a weird-looking hat. But somehow, you
make it work!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, a beret! I like berets. And that one looks
really good on you.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...That hat seems awfully familiar. Kind of beat-
up, though, isn't it?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, seems we've got a monarch all up in our
business! Unless that crown's fake...but you
wouldn't lie to us, would you, Your Majesty?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Anyone with a black eye patch has gotta be a
bad guy. And that evil expression sure doesn't
help your case! Hahaha...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong with your eye? Have you seen a
doctor about it? You should never mess around
with eye injuries. They can be serious business.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm not exactly cut out to be a receptionist, but
if nobody's here, people are going to think the
inn's closed, or out of business...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...Zzz...  Zzzzzz... Zz...zzzzz...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bedtime already? Maaaaaan. You should
probably go home and get some shut-eye, too.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm in the middle of my meal at the moment.
Would you mind waiting until I'm done to talk to
me?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wooden benches can get pretty warm, huh? I
honestly look forward to my rest breaks these
days. Walking is nice, but sitting...aaaaahh!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a pretty bench! Red is a favorite color of
mine, you know.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nice wooden box. Seems pretty useful, too:
there's no end to the things you can put in a
wooden box...though no open flames, I guess!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Scarecrows! That takes me back. There used to
be a bunch of them around here, but you don't
see them much anymore. Wonder why...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't know what those bricks are for, but if you
don't need them, can I have them? ...No? Oh. I
see...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a pretty old, beat-up wagon, but hey, if it
gets the job done, more power to you!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd like to make a totem pole like that one day.
Maybe even a bigger one!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a strange-looking table. I have no idea
where it's from, but it certainly is unique!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So it's...a chair, of sorts...carved out of a log?
Man, I think even I could make that...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If there were a garden at my inn, I'd snatch up a
parasol like that in a heartbeat. It would look so
good, and do wonders for the ambiance.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that hand pump functional? I still bring water
up from the well, so something like that could
save me a lot of hassle.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, this takes me back. I used to love
swinging!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A fire extinguisher alone does not a contingency
plan make. This town really needs some disaster
prevention training or something.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's an awfully big daruma doll. If I put one of
those in my inn, I bet it would draw some nice
crowds...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That castle... It looks pretty cool, but what do
you do with it?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey, is that one of those things that fills
with water and clacks on the ground? I've heard
of those, but never seen one before.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, Gotter Robo! I remember watching that
show on TV a long time ago.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love carnations. Just the sight of them puts me
at ease.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hilton daisies are among my favorite flowers.
Supposedly, they symbolize mystery.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love carnations. Just the sight of them puts me
at ease.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hilton daisies are among my favorite flowers.
Supposedly, they symbolize mystery.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm... Can't harvest a bamboo shoot from
potted bamboo, can you? That's kind of a
shame...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hooray for red flower baskets! Red is my favorite
color.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow. Nice lion topiary! Really well made.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That pine tree looks really nice. If I had a garden,
I'd definitely want one just like it.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How in the world can a statue of an alpaca look
as fluffy as the real deal? That's amazing!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heh. I love the funny face on that llama statue.
So cute!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know what that arbor needs? Red roses. Do
it! You know you want to...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wooden fences add a touch of warmth to any
field or garden.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Stone walls may have a cold appearance, but
they also look as heavy and solid as they are.
Makes you feel safe and secure.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmmm... Everywhere I look, I see red. And I love
anything that's fiery red, so I have to say,
<MYNAME>, you have good taste.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, yellow's a nice color too. It always cheers
me up.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, it's like a tropical paradise! I wonder if I
could get more customers by decorating my inn
just like this...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Haha... It's like it's summer here all the time.
Brilliant! Love the atmosphere.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's like there's a farm in the middle of town!
Tourists from the big city would love this.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a nice playground. I think Melanie would
really like it. I should let her know it's here.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know the Silk Country booth? Their
selection of products is just...unbeatable!
<PAGE>
You can buy most anything you'd need there.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear Cabin Country opened a booth in the
Trade Depot. I wonder what they're selling...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rumor has it Sakura Country's rice is the best-
tasting of the bunch, but I'm more interested in
seeing what else they've got...

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wheat Country's been getting some good
representation at the Trade Depot lately. You can
buy grains there on the cheap.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear Rose Country sells really good wine. I'd be
very interested in testing the legitimacy of that
particular rumor.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tropical Country's booth sells some seriously
styling shades. You should check them out -- I
think they'd look good on you!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rumor has it Ice Country's booth sells <GREEN>Elli
Leaves</GREEN>. You can't get those anywhere else, so
that's pretty big.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you've rented several fields and are
growing all kinds of crops these days. That's
some nice work! Keep it up!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're doing great. You're a full-fledged farmer
now, through and through.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You heard we've got a new face around here,
right? I'm betting the newbie could use some
help. Are you up to the task?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, this town has seriously become famous. I
see people from all over the world now.
<PAGE>
Most of them are just here to shop, though, so I
guess it doesn't impact my business too much.
But still!

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since your arrival, this town has seriously
started to boom. Veronica must be really happy
about that.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This isn't the most populous town, nor the most
accessible, but it's a nice place to take it slow
and enjoy each day.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The more people that come to this town, the
more work we have to do. So maybe the status
quo isn't so bad after all, you know?

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My older daughter, Lillie, is working in another
town, and she says not too many people there
have heard of this place.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear the Trade Depot is getting busier these
days.
<PAGE>
Stands to reason, what with all the different
countries selling all their exotic goods. I need to
check the place out more thoroughly myself.

<FACE_MORRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's your allowance for today. Use it well.
